value.name: Vulnerable widow betrayed by friend's daughter who stole £2,000 from bank account
value.description: Mary Lawrence said she had been "treated like poison" by her friend Ray Trodden's daughter Melanie. The 75-year-old former shopkeeper said: "I feel totally betrayed. It's taken its toll on me."
